title: Cant send ticket to Riot

replies.body:
Hey,

Have you tried the username and password recovery process already?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751724-Recovering-Your-Username
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751734-Recovering-Your-Password

Hey there,

Were any parts of the form autofilled by your browser? It's possible this may be causing your issue.

* Have you tried a different browser?
You should submit a ticket to Riot about not being able to submit a ticket to Riot.
